title: Revelations from Alien Encounters
body: Truth Hunter launches with Linda Moulton Howe exploring revelations forthcoming from profound alien encounters. First we examine details of two strange cases where UFO contactees became unwitting messengers of extraterrestrial communications. After strange lights appeared in the night sky above the Woodbridge Airforce base in Rendelsham, James Penniston and Sergeant “C.J.” became conduits for these bizarre binary messages. We also explore information forthcoming from abductees who reveal a dying race that will stop at nothing to preserve the continuation of their species. More so, their encounters present us with a glimpse into advanced spiritual technology and the interdependence of multi-dimensional universes.
teaser: Truth Hunter launches with Linda Moulton Howe exploring revelations forthcoming from profound alien encounters.

title: Whistleblowers Expose the Alien Agenda for Earth
body: Unbeknownst to a vast majority of the population, humanity has a long and complicated history with extraterrestrial beings. Whistleblowers from the military and government explain that Earth is caught in the middle of a battle to retain ownership of our planet, and we are simply pawns in a galactic chess game. Linda Moulton Howe conveys information she has collected from several insiders who have come forward to reveal what they know about extraterrestrial races, long-term genetic projects involving humans, what happens to a soul as it reincarnates across many lifetimes, and much more.
teaser: Whistleblowers from the military and government explain that Earth is caught in the middle of a battle to retain ownership of our planet, and we are simply pawns in a galactic chess game. Linda Moulton Howe conveys information she has collected from several insiders who have come forward to reveal what they know about the alien presence on Earth.

title: Insiders Reveal the Alien Struggle for Humanity’s Future
body: Contact with extraterrestrial beings and leaked insider information reveal that a secret war between interplanetary civilizations persists on our planet. One side wants to enable the evolution of our consciousness to unite with the divine field. The other wants to prevent this evolution in order to continue their harvesting operations. Thus, humanity is caught within an existential crisis of extraterrestrial origin. Linda Moulton Howe has analyzed the continuing binary communications transmitted through Staff Sergeant C.J. and information obtained through remote viewers like Lyn Buchanan. She reports on the four classifications of extraterrestrial beings and their particular motivations throughout this ongoing secret war.
teaser: Linda Moulton Howe has analyzed the continuing binary communications transmitted through Staff Sergeant C.J. and information obtained through remote viewers like Lyn Buchanan. She reports on the four classifications of extraterrestrial beings and their particular motivations throughout this ongoing secret war.

title: Rendlesham Forest: Three Strange Nights
body: The strange events of Rendlesham forest in December of 1980 have become well known throughout major UFO seeker communities. Less well known are the personal stories and official reports filed by the people who bore witness to the aerial lights on those strange nights. Linda Moulton Howe begins an extensive exposé concerning the strange events of RAF Bentwaters/ Woodbridge which includes her personal interviews with eyewitnesses, a hypnosis session with contactee John Burroughs, and an examination of official reports from those who were there.
teaser: Linda Moulton Howe begins an extensive exposé concerning the strange events of RAF Bentwaters/ Woodbridge which includes her personal interviews with eyewitnesses, a hypnosis session with contactee John Burrows, and an examination of official reports from those who were there.

title: Rendlesham Forest: Contact Is Made
body: Linda Moulton Howe continues her examination into the strange events of Rendlesham Forest in December of 1980. This time, we learn of the ramifications of physical contact made with an alien craft by one of the airmen stationed at the base. The presence of this craft was confirmed by an investigative team, sent out the next morning. What happened to John Burroughs that night remains foggy, but details of his experience are finally coaxed out in another hypnosis session which takes him back to his fateful encounter.
teaser: Linda Moulton Howe continues her examination into the strange events of Rendlesham Forest in December of 1980.

title: The Unheard Truth Behind Roswell's UFOs
body: Strange occurrences in Roswell, NM, June 1947 may have set into motion events which would shape the future of humanity, in ways unbeknownst to many. Reports of crashed alien vessels were quickly swept aside, which spurred the imaginations of seekers everywhere vying to know what really happened. But it was the insiders, who eventually came forward, who gave us a glimpse into the shadowy side of the U.S. Government and collaborating corporations. In this special introductory overview episode of Truth Hunter, Linda Moulton Howe exposes deeper details of UFO crashes in the 1940s, the technologies which were recovered and the resultant government policies which instituted programs of secrecy and denial.
teaser: In this special introductory overview  episode of Truth Hunter, Linda Moulton Howe exposes deeper details of UFO crashes in the 1940s, the technologies which were recovered and the resultant government policies which instituted programs of secrecy and denial.

title: Rendlesham Forest: Binary Messages Decoded
body: The Rendlesham Forest UFO incident, known as Britain's Roswell, left many unanswered mysteries. Linda Moulton Howe’s exposé into the RAF Woodbridge UFO encounters comes to a startling conclusion with an examination of the binary messages produced by United States Air Force Staff Sergeant Jim Penniston following his contact with an alien craft in Rendlesham forest. Perhaps more startling than the strange zeros and ones produced by Penniston, are the actual messages revealed when translating the binary code into English. Messages which expose why these strange visitors have come to our planet. Could the Rendlesham Forest incident be an elaborate hoax or are the servicemen witness statements accurate? Did USAF personnel see strange lights emanating from an extraterrestrial craft of unknown origin? Did Penniston visit the landing site and encounter something otherworldly?
teaser: Linda Moulton Howe’s exposé into the RAF encounters comes to a startling conclusion with an examination of the binary messages produced by Staff Sargent Penniston following his contact with an alien craft in Rendlesham forest.

title: Introduction to an Alien Taxonomy
body: After three decades of interviewing hundreds of people who have been contacted by extraterrestrial beings, Linda Moulton Howe has a compiled a taxonomy of the many types of non-human entities which have visited our planet. From grey-skinned humanoids to upright reptilians, she has uncovered a wide diversity of life capable of traversing vast cosmic expanses. She introduces us to her taxonomy of extraterrestrial beings on Earth and explores various motivations which have prompted their arrival. Some are new to the planet, while others have interacted with humanity for over 70,000 years and maintain close contact with Earth’s governments.
teaser: Linda Moulton Howe has a compiled a taxonomy of the many types of non-human entities which have visited our planet. Some are new to the planet, while others have interacted with humanity for over 70,000 years

title: Proof of Presidential Briefings on the Alien Presence
body: In 1983, an anonymous source contacted Linda Moulton Howe to disclose what military intelligence organizations knew about the alien presence on Earth. Since that time, she has come into additional documents, leaked from government organizations, which reveal what past presidents knew about UFOs and human interactions with extraterrestrial visitors. Most glaring of these disclosures is a briefing prepared for Ronald Reagan. We see the documents which informed Reagan of five types of alien beings, their intentions for our people and an overview of their technological capabilities.
teaser: In 1983, an anonymous source contacted Linda Moulton Howe to disclose what military intelligence organizations knew about the alien presence on Earth. We see documents which informed Reagan of five types of alien beings, their intentions for our people and an overview of their technological capabilities.

title: U.K. Cover-Ups: From UFOs to UAPs
body: Organizations within the U.S. government are not the only ones implicated in a vast conspiracy to conceal the alien presence on Earth. Linda Moulton Howe explains that branches of the British government actively worked to conceal the events and lingering consequences of the Rendlesham Forest incident. Documents leaked from these agencies include reports of non-ionizing radiation emitted from UFOs which cause lost time, memory erasure and tissue damage. None may have suffered more than John Burrows whose medical records were sealed after he was exposed to this radiation. It took the intervention of two U.S. Senators before he finally got the medical help he needed.
teaser: Organizations within the U.S. government are not the only ones implicated in a vast conspiracy to conceal the alien presence on Earth. Linda Moulton Howe explains that branches of the British government actively worked to conceal proof of alien activity.

title: Detailing the Government's Alien Taxonomy
body: Linda Moulton Howe digs deeper into the presidential briefings presented to Ronald Reagan and we gain a clearer view of who these five species of aliens are, where the come from, and who made whom. These detailed disclosures tell us how long the Ebens have been on earth and the extent of their genetic control over humanity and other alien beings.  Additional leaked documents further elaborate on the U.S. government’s involvement with extraterrestrial civilizations, from communication to testing of UFOs and how information is transferred between clandestine organizations.
teaser: Dig into presidential briefings to gain a clearer view of five species of aliens the U.S government know of and where the come from. These detailed disclosures tell us how long they have been on Earth and the extent of their genetic control over humanity.

title: Preview Season 2 of Truth Hunter
body:
NEW SEASON BEGINS OCTOBER 17TH!

This special update of Truth Hunter with journalist Linda Moulton Howe features a series of exclusive interviews with Tim from Germany, a tactical advisor with covert projects on ET contact.
teaser:
NEW SEASON BEGINS OCTOBER 17TH!
This special update of Truth Hunter with journalist Linda Moulton Howe features a series of exclusive interviews with Tim from Germany, a tactical advisor with covert projects on ET contact.

title: DNA Manipulation & Encounters with the Greys
body: What evidence do we have of extraterrestrials manipulating human DNA? Award-winning journalist Linda Moulton Howe returns for a special new season of Truth Hunter with Tim, the tactical advisor from Germany, to get to the truth behind ET interactions with humans over time. Analyzing Tim’s encounters with Greys in relation to Linda’s own discoveries about “extraterrestrial biological entities manipulating DNA of evolving primates to create Homo sapiens,” evidence and experiences are offered as insight into the truth of our evolution.
teaser: What evidence do we have of extraterrestrials manipulating human DNA? Journalist Linda Moulton Howe returns for a special season of Truth Hunter with Tim,Tactical Advisor from Germany, to find to the truth behind ET interactions with humans over time.

title: Intergalactic Travel & Consciousness Technologies
body: What are the connections between warp drives, portals, and psychic phenomena allowing beings to travel across vast distances of space? In this interview, award-winning journalist Linda Moulton Howe asks Tim, Tactical Advisor from Germany, about the mechanics behind levels of consciousness and light-speed travel. Explaining the manipulation of time and space, Tim details how higher vibratory beings can attain intergalactic travel through consciousness-driven technologies.
teaser: What are the connections between warp drives, portals, and psychic phenomena allowing beings to travel across vast distances of space? Linda Moulton Howe interviews Tim, Tactical Advisor from Germany, about levels of consciousness and light-speed travel.

title: Contacting Being 6
body: How can we understand higher levels of non-human consciousness in the universe? Tactical Advisor Tim describes his experiences with Being 6, a collective of souls operating in harmony at a higher frequency. Tim interfaced with Being 6 as a crystalline blue light, and he explains how others have seen Being 6 as a blue colored entity, similar to the divine beings depicted in the ancient Vedas of India.
teaser: How can we understand higher levels of non-human consciousness in the universe? Tactical Advisor Tim describes his experiences with Being 6, a collective of souls operating in harmony at a higher frequency.

title: Geometry of the Soul
body: Is our universe an experiment in levels of consciousness? Linda Moulton Howe and Tactical Advisor Tim delve into the deeper truths of our reality, citing Tim’s direct face-to-face experiences with extraterrestrials. Together they connect abductions, cloning, and hybridization programs with Mantis beings and the Greys, relating all this to the geometry of souls.
teaser: Is our universe an experiment in levels of consciousness? Linda Moulton Howe and Tactical Advisor Tim delve into the deeper truths of our reality, citing Tim’s direct face-to-face experiences with extraterrestrials.

title: Multidimensional Pathways of the Soul
body: What is a consciousness unit and the pathway of the soul? Linda Moulton Howe and Tim discuss how consciousness units are vessels where the soul resides and how its pathway can traverse through different states of being and dimensions. Tim shares his direct experiences with ETs and draws an analogy between beings existing in alternative dimensions to life forms on land versus in the deep oceans of Earth.
teaser: What is a consciousness unit and the pathway of the soul? Linda Moulton Howe and Tim discuss what we can learn from these concepts.

title: Removing the Reptilian Installation
body: Could depression be a side effect of an ancient ET installation put in place to slow the evolution of humanity? Tactical Advisor Tim continues his in-depth interview with Linda Moulton Howe to discuss the motivations of Reptilians involved with an installation that limits humanity’s full potential on planet Earth. From temporal modifications and outside influences on human history to the subtle effects of ET technologies and psionics, Tim reveals this installation is being removed to restore the proper speed of humanity’s evolutionary process.
teaser: Could depression be a side effect of an ancient ET installation put in place to slow the evolution of humanity? Tim continues his interview with Linda Moulton Howe to discuss the motivations of a Reptilians installation limiting humanity’s potential.

title: Holoforms, Psionics & ET Manipulation
body: Are humans unknowingly interacting with ETs on Earth? From psionics to holoforms, Tim explains how non-terrestrials can cloak themselves using acoustic frequencies to manipulate the perceptions of both humans and ETs. As contactees and experts disclose further information, we are learning more about potential agendas of Reptilians, Greys, and other ET beings with an interest in our human civilization.
teaser: Are humans unknowingly interacting with ETs on Earth? From psionics to holoforms, Tim explains how non-terrestrials can cloak themselves using acoustic frequencies to manipulate the perceptions of both humans and ETs.

title: The Self-Correcting Universe
body: Will we ever know the cosmic lineage of humanity’s origins on Earth? In this final episode, Tim and Linda Moulton Howe analyze the extraterrestrial species and competing influences that shaped Earth’s history. Tim offers his direct experiences with the Greys and Being 6 in relation to a self-correcting universe. Linda shares her research on tall whites and the Nordics to explore how these species travel the stars and interact with Earth for reasons we are still discovering.
teaser: Will we ever know the cosmic lineage of humanity’s origins on Earth? In this final episode, Tim and Linda Moulton Howe analyze the extraterrestrial species and competing influences that shaped Earth’s history.
